title: Cloud Bytes: Your CCD 2025 Intro!
description: Cloud Community Days 2025 Indore is on the horizon — and we’re thrilled to kick off the excitement with a power-packed virtual session featuring Karan Mittal , in collaboration with GDG On Campus chapters !

title: GSC PPT Discussion Session with GenAI Study Jams 2024 Swags Distribution
description:
Google Solutions Challenge: Project Submission & Swags Distribution organized by Google Developer Groups (GDG) On Campus at the School of Data Science and Forecasting.

Event Details:

- 📅 Date: 18th March 2025

- ⏰ Time: 3:00 PM (IST)

- 📍 Venue: Seminar Hall, SDSF

Agenda:

- Introduction to Google Solutions Challenge (GSC) and project submission guidelines

- Details on PPT submission deadlines

- Swags distribution for participants

title: PPT/Project Discussion Session
description:
📢 Event: PPT/Project Discussion Session – Google Solution Challenge 2025 🚀
Are you ready to submit your project for the Google Solution Challenge 2025 but unsure how to complete the official PPT template? Don’t worry! Join our PPT/Project Discussion Session, where we will guide you step-by-step on how to fill out the submission PPT and structure your project effectively.

🔍 What to Expect?✅ Walkthrough of the Google Solution Challenge PPT – Learn how to fill each section correctly.

✅ Project Structuring Guidance – Understand how to refine your solution before submission.

✅ Recap of the Google Solution Challenge Info Session – Key takeaways and updates.

✅ Q&A and Open Discussion – Get answers to all your doubts.



🎯 Who Should Attend?

Participants of Google Solution Challenge 2025

- Teams and individuals preparing for project submission

- Anyone looking for clarity on the PPT and project development



🚀 Why Attend?

🔹 Ensure your PPT is complete and impactful for submission.

🔹 Learn best practices to present your solution effectively.

🔹 Gain insights from the previous info session and enhance your project.

🔹 Clarify doubts with mentors and peers.



📢 Don’t miss this crucial session! Register now and submit your project with confidence.



Let’s make an impact together! 🌍💡

title: Google Solutions Challenge Info Session
description:
Join us for the Google Solutions Challenge Info Session, an exciting event designed to introduce you to the Google Solution Challenge 2025! This competition, hosted by Google Developer Groups (GDG) & Hack2Skill, challenges students to create innovative tech solutions that address one or more of the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) using Google technologies.

In this session, you will:

✅ Learn about the challenge details, rules, and timeline

✅ Get insights into Google technologies you can use

✅ Discover team formation strategies and how to craft a strong project

✅ Participate in a Q&A session

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, this session will equip you with the knowledge and motivation to kickstart your journey in the Google Solution Challenge. Don’t miss this opportunity to network, collaborate, and innovate for global impact!

title: Tech Winter Break + GDG On Campus School of Data Science and Forecasting
description:
Join the Google Developer Groups (On Campus) webinar  on 22nd December at 7 PM to learn about the Google Solution Challenge. The session will cover the challenge overview, participation steps, and tips on leveraging Google technologies for success.

Speakers Sanika and Apoorv will guide you through this exciting opportunity. Don’t miss it!

title: Community Connect: GDG On Campus, GenAi & Core Team
description:
🚀 Get Ready for the GDG SDSF Community Connect! 🚀


Supercharge your coding journey with creativity and the power of Generative AI! Join us tomorrow for an exciting briefing session hosted by Google Developer Groups - School of Data Science and Forecasting.


📅 Date: 18th October 2024

🕙 Time: 10 AM onwards

📍 Venue: SDSF DAVV

💻 Note: Don’t forget to bring your laptop!


🔑 Agenda:

- Introduction to GDG on Campus

- GDG Core Team Registration

- GenAI Study Jams: Code Redemption & Rules


Don't miss out on this opportunity to explore GenAI, connect with fellow developers, and become part of our dynamic community. See you there!

title: GDG SDSF Info Session
description:
This is an info session event on Google Developer Groups On Campus School of Data Science and Forecasting, Indore.

In this event, the concept of Google Developer Groups and it's goals will be discussed.

Some more information and our future goals will be discussed will be revealed in this session
